summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Clara website V2 with enhanced brutalist tech aesthetic. All major features working correctly including new sys.init indicators, availability badge, zoom controls, and modal functionality.

integration_issues.issue: Execution context destroyed during navigation between pages in automated testing - does not affect user experience

passed_tests: Page loader shows 'sys.init' text with loading bar animation
Hero sys.init indicator present in top-right corner
Availability badge text correct: 'aceitamos 2 projectos por mês'
Availability badge has pulsing dot animation
Navigation links work correctly (4 links found)
Mobile hamburger menu opens and closes successfully
ANTES image modal opens with zoom controls (+, 1:1, −)
All zoom controls work correctly (zoom in, reset, zoom out)
DEPOIS iframe modal opens with proper proportions (100% width/height)
Iframe modal displays full website preview correctly
Blinking cursor animation detected on section titles (5 titles found)
Footer status dot found with pulse animation
Tech aesthetic elements working: monospace fonts, brutalist design, black/white contrast
Console easter egg present: '– clara.' and 'sys.init > presença digital com clareza'
success_percentage: frontend: 95% - All core functionality working, minor testing-only navigation issue
